duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide technical maintenance and reliability leadership for electrical, instrumentation & analyzer systems and process issues.
Develop & implement electrical, instrumentation & analyzer systems aligned with company and industry objectives.
Mentor technicians and electrical engineers, and participate in training needs assessment and delivery.
Analyze market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activity to identify growth opportunities and refine strategies.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED, with a minimum of five years of experience in a chemical manufacturing environment, preferably in EIA or electrical engineering role.
